item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, September 13, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:

6. Swimmable Cities (102 points | 82 comments)

29. What Does It Take to Run Shor's Algorithm on a Quantum Computer? (19 points | 1 comment)
